game-cards.name: Monsterra
game-cards.description: The game set foot in a fictional world and revolves around farming, property building, and battling other lands with the magical creatures named Mongen.

game-cards.name: Dragon Crypto
game-cards.description: The game set foot in a fictional world and revolves around farming, property building, and battling other lands with the magical creatures named Mongen.

game-cards.name: Decentraland
game-cards.description: Decentraland is a digital game that mimics reality in 3-D and is a user-owned, Ethereum-based virtual reality world platform. Decentraland users oversee this digital world through a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO).

game-cards.name: Sunflower land
game-cards.description: Sunflower Land is a play-to-own NFT game that operates on the Polygon Blockchain Network. The game revolves around a real-world theme based on food supply and demand. Players can farm crops, gather resources, cook food, raise animals, craft items, evolve their Bumpkin, and expand their land to build a farming empire.

game-cards.name: Aavegotchi
game-cards.description: League of Kingdoms is the world's first blockchain based MMO strategy game. You can own in-game assets such as lands and resources as NFTs. Similar to other MMO strategy games such as Clash of Clans, you will gather resources, develop buldings and build troops to win battles and conquer enemy lands.

game-cards.name: Wolf Game
game-cards.description: League of Kingdoms is the world's first blockchain based MMO strategy game. You can own in-game assets such as lands and resources as NFTs. Similar to other MMO strategy games such as Clash of Clans, you will gather resources, develop buldings and build troops to win battles and conquer enemy lands.

treasury.name: Assasing knife
treasury.subTitle: The assasin most dangerous weapon
treasury.description: The Hidden Blade is the definitive weapon of the Assassin Order and was designed as a means to enact discrete assassinations. The blade extended from a specially designed bracer which could be easily concealed to compliment the Assassins affinity for stealth.
treasury.tags: Hidden Blade Assassin Order Weapon Assassinations Discrete Blade Bracer Concealed Stealth Affinity
